newsitem.title: GEORGIA: Georgian December inflation slows to 0.7 pct.
newsitem.headline: Georgian December inflation slows to 0.7 pct.

text.p: Georgia's monthly consumer price inflation was 0.7 percent in December after 1.1 percent in November, the Department for Social and Economic Information said on Tuesday.
GEORGIAN CONSUMER PRICES DEC 96 NOV 96 DEC 95
